xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Translations for the LiveTable found on QA.WebHome and the Space.WebHome of the test spaces qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.creationDate=Creation Date qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.date=Update Date qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.title=Test qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.doc.space=Category qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.product=Latest version tested qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.browsers=Browsers qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.databases=Databases qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.servletContainers=Containers qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.javas=Java qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.distributions=Distribution qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.automated=Automated qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions=Action qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.no.tests.execution.found=No test executions found qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions.runTest=Run Test qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable._actions.delete=Delete Test qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.userType=User Type qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.wikiType=Wiki Type qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.emptyvalue= qaapp.WebHome.LiveTable.deprecated=Deprecated
# Translations for the LiveTable found on each TestPage and Product page qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.doc.title=Test qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.test=Name qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.product=Product qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.browser=Browsers qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.browsers=Browsers qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.database=Databases qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.servletContainer=Containers qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.java=Java qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.distribution=Distribution qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.user=Tested By qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.date=Tested On qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.passed=Result qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.jira=Jira Issue qaapp.Custom.LiveTable._actions=Action qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.doc.space=Category
# Translations for the buttons from QA.WebHome qaapp.WebHome.addTest.button=Add Test qaapp.WebHome.hallOfFame.button=Hall Of Fame qaapp.WebHome.statistics.button=Statistics qaapp.WebHome.management.button=Management
# Translations for Management Page qaapp.Management.AddTest.button=Add new Test qaapp.Management.AddProduct.button=Add new Product Version qaapp.Management.AddBrowser.button=Add new Browser qaapp.Management.AddDatabase.button=Add new Database qaapp.Management.AddServletContainer.button=Add new Servlet Container qaapp.Management.AddJava.button=Add new Java Version qaapp.Management.AddDistribution.button=Add new Distribution Version qaapp.Management.AddApp.button=Add new App Version
# Translations for the Add Test form qaapp.AddTest.button=Add a new test qaapp.AddTest.testName.label=Test Name qaapp.AddTest.testSpace.label=Test Space
# Translations in the Add Product form qaapp.AddProduct.button=Add a new product qaapp.AddProduct.productName.label=Product Name qaapp.AddProduct.productVersion.label=Product Version
# Translations in the Add Browser form qaapp.AddBrowser.button=Add a new browser qaapp.AddBrowser.browserName.label=Browser Name qaapp.AddBrowser.browserVersion.label=Browser Version
# Translations in the Add Database form qaapp.AddDatabase.button=Add a new database qaapp.AddDatabase.databaseName.label=Database Name qaapp.AddDatabase.databaseVersion.label=Database Version
# Translation in the Add Servlet container qaapp.AddServletContainer.servletName=Add a new servlet container qaapp.AddServletContainer.servletName.label=Servlet Container Name qaapp.AddServletContainer.servletVersion.label=Servlet Container Version
# Translation in the Add Java container qaapp.AddJava.java.label=Java Version qaapp.AddJava.javaVersion=Add a new java version qaapp.AddJava.javaVersion.label=Java Version qaapp.AddJava.javaName=Add a new JDK vendor qaapp.AddJava.javaName.label=JDK Vendor Name
# Translation in the Add Distribution container qaapp.AddDistribution.distribution.label=Distribution Version qaapp.AddDistribution.distributionVersion=Add a new distribution version qaapp.AddDistribution.distributionVersion.label=Distribution Version qaapp.AddDistribution.distributionName=Add a new distribution qaapp.AddDistribution.distributionName.label=Distribution Name
# Translations in the Add App form qaapp.AddApp.button=Add a new app qaapp.AddApp.AppName.label=App Name qaapp.AddApp.appVersion.label=App Version qaapp.Custom.LiveTable.application=App
